description.value: You never lose your cool. When you become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Frightened] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied], you immediately reduce the value of the condition by 1. When you would gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Confused] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Controlled] condition, you can attempt a @Check[flat|dc:16]. On a success, you don't get the confused or controlled condition.
